answers.answer: Im not sure have you tried wearing a ring (a cheap one so you can stretch it just in case) throughout the day? If your hands are swelling the ring will get tighter around your fingers.
Havent tried but i could today :) im just worried.dont want preeclampsia or something.so close to the end.dont want anything to happen :/ but ill try it today..thank you! :)
Try to keep off your feet as much as you can.
I would love to! Trust me hah but im a cashier and my job doesnt allow me to sit on a stool..even as far along as i am.they wont allow it :/ but i so want to! My feet become so red/purple :(
I actually had to stop working at 33 weeks cause of swelling :/
How come babydue? What did your doctor say?

I was swelling really bad. Lol Idk how else to put it. Like my legs and feet swelled up and it never went down. So ny doctor told me to start working part time and my job didn't allow that so they let me go. He was worried I was going to develop preeclampsia cause my blood pressure was elevated the couple weeks before I stopped. Now everything is alright. If I didn't stop I was convinced I was gonna have her early

question: So im 33+3. My feet seem to always be swollen but are my hands? I cant tell if theyre swollen.the best way i can describe it is it feels like ive been squeezing a stress relieving ball or that hand exerciser thing constantly. It hurts to close my hands sometimes.kinda like its stiff but i can move them.my hands have never been swollen so is this what it feels like? Should i be concerned?
title: swelling question
